CustomField.description: Secure ("https://") location of an image that will display on the event with the speaker"s name and bio. Square images work best. Image should be at least 412px square and the file size should be less than 250 KB.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Secure ("https://") location of an image that will display on the event with the speaker"s name and bio. Square images work best. Image should be at least 412px square and the file size should be less than 250 KB.
CustomField.label: Speaker Photo URL
